title: कश्मीर में भारतीय पुलिस द्वारा अत्याचार के झूठे दावे से पाकिस्तान का वीडियो प्रसारित
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Few Days back a video was made viral on Social media in which People in police uniform were shown torturing women while raiding a house.This video proved fake and it was designed to malign Sindh Police in general and Jamshoro Police in particular.#Sindhpolicedmcpic.twitter.com/QbQAY2CqKF
